name: Creepy Grandpa’s House
description:
Are you ready to have fun with grandpa's house. Spend five horrors spooky night at grandpa house to find out the truth. Play the best games for grandpa in the creepy house and solve the puzzle of scared crazy mystery grandpa neighbor. Creepy grandpa shifted into the next door neighbor and he started kidnapping kids of the town. First of all enter into the neighbor’s creepy grandpa house while he is walking in the garden, Find bloody weapons from the house, collect clues to find the truth that why he is kidnapping kids in the town!

Features For Neighbor's Creepy Grandpa House

- Enter into the Creepy Grandpa House
- Spend Five Horror Spooky Night at Grandpa House
- Find the bloody weapons from the basement
- Read Magic Books to learn the Magic
- Find kidnapped kids from the house

Download Fun For Free!
